name: DoomZDay
description:
DoomZDay is a nostalgic shooter in the best traditions of past years, but with a high-quality graphics. Collect the currency hidden in the most unexpected places, and pump the necessary parameters of your choice.

Feel the atmosphere of loneliness, survival, lack of ammo and crowds of various monsters that crave your flesh!

- The ability to destroy monsters not only with different types of weapons, but also with special skills
- The presence of secret zones, find them and it will facilitate your survival
- System for improving the parameters of the hero and weapons between levels
- A variety of monsters, each player will find for himself exactly the monster that is most anxious
- Music that changes every scene and conveys the mood of the levels
